name: @primer/figma-action
description: GitHub action for exporting figma components.

scripts.print-section: node renderMustache.js template=./template.jpg.md  outputDir=./dist page='Page 1' section='Section 1'
scripts.print-layer: node renderMustacheLayer.js template=./template.png.md outputDir='./dist/Page 1/Section 1' layer='iPhone 14 & 15 Pro Max - 1'

author: GitHub, Inc.
